thread.section_title: Keller Sports Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Keller Sports | www.keller-sports.com
thread.title: Paul

author: Paul
title: Paul
text: Despite reviewing several negative comments on this website, I went ahead and made an order for a product which was a great price. It arrived in just a couple of days. In the end the item didn't fit and it was returned to Germany via courier. Although there were some hiccups with this, it eventually made it back to the Keller Sports and the refund was promptly received. Customer service generally good at each step of the way. I would use them again.
